name: I PROMISE TO FAIL | Object #2 - pizza 1
description: This is the second of many single objects wrapped up with the Brazilian cleaning tissue: Perfex. The concept of the work is based on the expectation of failure. The marketing promoted by the cleaning product promises perfection, absolute cleanliness and high-performance. However, the imminent failure is questioned as soon as its acetic superficiality comes into contact with its use.  video, 12' | 1080 x 1080 px | 15,1 MG - Twitter @erica__storer
